Q: Can I choose my preferred workshop for accident repairs?
A: HL Assurance Motor policy gives you the freedom to choose your own workshop in Singapore. However, if you choose to use our HL Assurance Approved Workshop for repair, you can be assured that genuine manufacturers’ parts are used and it comes with a full 9 months repair warranty. Own Damage Excess will be halved if you choose to repair your vehicle at our HL Assurance Approved Workshop. To view the list of HL Assurance Approved Workshops, please click here .
